name: Gloria Allred
description:
Gloria Allred is the most famous woman attorney practicing law in the nation today. But don't take our word for it, it's right there, on her own website. The very first sentence. "Gloria Allred is the most famous woman attorney practicing law in the nation today." See, we're not kidding.

It doesn't end there. According to her website, she is a "tireless crusader". Her "legal reach has been wide and long". She is "combating injustices". She is a "fearless lawyer, feminist, activist, television and radio commentator, warrior, advocate, and winner â€” Gloria Allred is all of these things and more." And more!

More? "One of the best lawyers in America." A "remarkable woman". She "has played a role in many groundbreaking legal decisions that have forever changed our lives for the better." Forever! Wow. We're speechless. Just wow.

And yes, she is Jewish, born Gloria Bloom.

With plaudits like these, who needs some random rating website to say how good you are?
